tool_description: Creates optimized breeding schedules and mating assignments based on compatibility scores, breeding goals, and operational constraints.

planning_period_start.description: Start date of the breeding period

planning_period_end.description: End date of the breeding period

available_males.description: List of available male animal IDs

available_females.description: List of available female animal IDs

breeding_method.description: Breeding method: natural, artificial_insemination, or embryo_transfer

max_matings_per_male.description: Maximum number of females per male (1-50)

optimization_priority.description: Primary optimization goal: genetic_gain, diversity, or balanced

error_messages: Invalid date range: planning_period_start must be before planning_period_end.
Empty animal lists: Both available_males and available_females must contain at least one ID.
Animal not found: One or more animal IDs do not exist in the registry.
Invalid breeding method: Must be 'natural', 'artificial_insemination', or 'embryo_transfer'.
Invalid max matings: max_matings_per_male must be between 1 and 50.
Invalid optimization priority: Must be 'genetic_gain', 'diversity', or 'balanced'.
usage: Specify the planning period dates and lists of available males and females. Customize breeding_method, max_matings_per_male, and optimization_priority as needed for your operation.

expected_offspring_count.description: Projected number of offspring from the plan

genetic_diversity_score.description: Expected genetic diversity score of offspring (0-100)
